publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2494 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Police (Retention and Disposal of Motor Vehicles) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/80).
